name: Rise of Nations Saved Game
summary: An MGX file is a saved game created by Rise of Nations, a real-time strategy game developed by Big Huge Games and published by Microsoft Game Studios. It contains a record of a player's in-progress game or campaign. Players can load MGX files in Rise of Nations to resume the saved game they contain.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

ios.display_name: Microsoft Game Studios Rise of Nations

windows.display_name: Microsoft Age of Empires 2: The Conquerors
